snippet.title: Kunoichi "Sword of the Assassin" 15+ Minutes of Gameplay
snippet.description:
PLAY KUNOICHI "SWORD OF THE ASSASSIN"! CLICK BELOW FOR MORE INFO!!!
http://www.playkunoichi.com/

EARLY ACCESS DATE: THIS FRIDAY! DECEMBER 9TH, 2022. (12/9/22)

Kunoichi "Sword of the Assassin" is an EARLY ACCESS game that will have A LOT of bugs! But even in it's initial state it is still A LOT of fun to play! See for yourself! Check out 15+ minutes of Kunoichi "Sword of the Assassin" gameplay. Also know that we are committed to fixing bugs and improving gameplay as we continue to work on the title for you all to play and enjoy! Next, we've had a few questions about Kunoichi that we would like to address.

Kunoichi pays homage in many ways to genres of entertainment in gaming and film most notably DOS platform game Sword of the Samurai from Microprose even at times using the same dialog (my favorite game growing up), Ninja Scroll (my favorite anime growing up), Kill Bill (my favorite film), Lady Snow Blood (film that heavily inspired Kill Bill) and more. These occurrences in game even down to using some of the same text from the DOS game IS INTENDED.

Kunoichi "Sword of the Assassin" is an action and stealth EARLY ACCESS game developed and published by Maiden Gaming built with the new UNREAL 5 ENGINE for the Windows PC platform available exclusively on Patreon. Players take the role of Takashida, a Kunoichi tasked with avenging her father's death at the hands of the Yokai Clan. It features role-playing, strategy, action and stealth set in feudal Japan. Kunoichi pays homage in many ways to genres of entertainment in gaming and film most notably DOS platform game Sword of the Samurai from Microprose (my favorite game growing up), Ninja Scroll (my favorite anime growing up), Kill Bill (my favorite film), Lady Snow Blood (film that heavily inspired Kill Bill) and more.

PLEASE LIKE & SHARE THE YOUTUBE VIDEO AND HELP US TO SPREAD THE WORD ABOUT KUNOICHI!!!

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/leagueofmaidens
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/5TU2NX9
TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/maidengaming_net
YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/leagueofmaidens
INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/leagueofmaidens/

Watch other Kunoichi videos! LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE TODAY!!!
